vampire.config_products.BaseDataset module¶

Dataset module.

Provides classes for each dataset supported within Vampire. New datasets should be added here.

class vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.BaseDataset[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for dataset configuration objects.

Manages registration of dataset configurations and creation of dataset configuration objects. Dataset configurations provide the ability to generate config file sections related to the specific dataset (e.g. data download, pre-processing).

classmethod create(dataset_type, interval, product_date, vampire_defaults, region=None)[source]¶

Create dataset of the specified type.

Creates the dataset identified by dataset_type and sets required values.

Parameters:
  • dataset_type (string) – Dataset name.
  • interval (string) – Interval for dataset generation - daily, weekly, monthly, seasonal.
  • product_date (datetime) – Date for dataset being generated.
  • vampire_defaults (VampireDefaults) –
  • region (string) – Default is None
Returns:

Dataset object of type specified (a registered subclass of BaseDataset).
classmethod register_subclass(dataset_type)[source]¶

Register dataset with the dataset manager.

Registers the dataset identified by datset_type with the dataset manager. This allows the appropriate dataset to be created automatically when requested.

Parameters:dataset_type (string) – Dataset name.
subclasses = {'CHIRPS': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.CHIRPSDataset'>, 'GFS': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.GlobalForecastSystemDataset'>, 'IMERG': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.IMERGDataset'>, 'MODIS_EVI': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.MODISEVIDataset'>, 'MODIS_LST': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.MODISLSTDataset'>}¶
class vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.CHIRPSDataset(interval, product_date, vampire_defaults, region=None)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.BaseDataset

CHIRPS dataset configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for CHIRPS datasets including download and cropping.

end_date()[source]¶

Get or set end date of data in dataset.

generate_config(data_dir=None, download=True, crop=True, crop_dir=None)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating VCI.

Generate config file entries required to create VCI for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Path of directory data should be downloaded to.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be downloaded.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be cropped following download.
  • crop_dir (string) – Path of directory for cropped data output.
Returns:

Config file sections required for retrieving CHIRPS data.
Return type:

string

Generate details related to CHIRPS that go in the config file header.

class vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.GlobalForecastSystemDataset(interval, product_date, vampire_defaults, region=None)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseDataset.BaseDataset

generate_config(data_dir=None, variable=None, level=None, forecast_hr=None, download=True, crop=True, crop_dir=None, accumulate_days=None)[source]¶

Generate config file section for downloading and pre-processing Global Forecast System models.

Generate config file entries required to create GFS data for the country, date and interval specified in the dataset initialization.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Path of directory data should be downloaded to.
  • variable (string) – Model variable to download.
  • level – Data level (e.g. surface).
  • forecast_hr – Hour of forecast.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be downloaded.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be cropped following download.
  • crop_dir (string) – Path of directory for cropped data output.
  • accumulate_days (int) – Number of days to accumulate.
Type:

string
Returns:

Config file sections required for retrieving GFS data.
Return type:

string

generate_config(data_dir=None, download=True, mosaic_dir=None, tiles=None, extract_dir=None, crop=True, crop_dir=None)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating IMERG.

Generate config file entries required to create IMERG for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Path of directory data should be downloaded to.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be downloaded.
  • mosaic_dir (string) – Path of directory for mosaic of downloaded data tiles.
  • tiles (string) – List of data tiles to download.
  • extract_dir (string) – Path of directory for extracted dataset.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be cropped following download.
  • crop_dir (string) – Path of directory for cropped data output.
Returns:

Config file sections required for retrieving IMERG data.
Return type:

string

generate_config(data_dir=None, download=True, mosaic_dir=None, tiles=None, extract_dir=None, crop=True, crop_dir=None)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating MODIS EVI.

Generate config file entries required to download MODIS EVI for the country, date and interval specified in the dataset initialization.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Path of directory data should be downloaded to.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be downloaded. Default is True.
  • mosaic_dir (string) – Path of directory for mosaic of downloaded data tiles.
  • tiles (string) – List of data tiles to download.
  • extract_dir (string) – Path of directory for extracted dataset.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be cropped following download.
  • crop_dir (string) – Path of directory for cropped data output.
Returns:

Config file sections required for retrieving IMERG data.
Return type:

string

Generate config file section for downloading MODIS Land Surface Temperature dataset.

Generate config file entries required to create MODIS LST for the country, date and interval specified in the dataset initialization.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Path of directory data should be downloaded to.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be downloaded.
  • mosaic_dir (string) – Path of directory for mosaic of downloaded data tiles.
  • tiles (string) – List of data tiles to download.
  • extract_dir (string) – Path of directory for extracted dataset.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating if data should be cropped following download.
  • crop_dir (string) – Path of directory for cropped data output.
Returns:

Config file sections required for retrieving IMERG data.
Return type:

string
